title: NA Building A flex team, need a JG
body:
Looking for a Casually Competitive 5-man To play and improve game sense and skill.
Below comment what Rank you are, and who your main characters are.
Please be Silver rank. We will be entering in some small tournaments probably, and scrimming against other teams to better our playstyles and game sense.
Please include your Discord username in the comments as well.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: hello. im s4. my discord info is drkemery#8730
